text: & sancta Eadburh þa to ðam mynstre feng æfter sancte Myldryþe.
& heo ða cyricean arærde, ðe hyre lichama nu inne resteð.
Ðonne wæs sancte Seaxburh & sancta æþeldryð & sancta Wihtburh, hy wæron Annan dohtra, EastEngla cynges.
Ðonne wæs sancta æþeldryð forgyfen twam werum, Tondbryhte Suðgyrwena ealdormæn & Ecgferðe Norðhymbrena cynige, to cwene.
& heo ðeahhwæþere hyre mægðhad geheold oð hyre lifes ende.
& heo ða hyre licreste geceas on Eligbyrig & ðær hyre mihta oft cuðe syndon.
Ðonne wæs sancte Eormenhild, Ercenbrihtes dohtor & Seaxburge, forgyfen Wulfhere, Pendan sunu Myrcena cinges, to cwene.
& on hyra dagum Myrcena ðeod onfeng fulluht.
& ðær hi begeaton sancte Wærburge ða halige fæmnan.
& heo resteþ on ðam mynstre, þe is gecweden Heanburh.
Ðonne resteð sancte Eormenhild on Eligbyrig mid hyre meder & mid hyre modrian sancte æþeldryða & heora mihta ðær oft cuðe syndon.
& sancta Seaxburh & sancta Eormenhild onfengon haligrifte on ðam mynstre, þe is gecweden Middeltune on Kentlande.
& þæt igland on Scæpyge hyrð into Middeltune & hit is ðreora mila brad & seofan mila lang.

Ða gelicode ðære halgan cwene Seaxburge, þæt heo ðærbinnan for myrhde & for mærðe hyre ðær mynster getimbrode & gestadelode, swa geo men cwædon, þæt ðrittigum gearum ne gestilde næfre stefen cearciendes wænes ne ceoriendes wales.
Ða þæt mynster getimbrod wæs, ða com hyre to Godes engel on nihtlicre gesihðe & hire bodode, þæt ær feala gearum hæðene leod <sceolden> ðas þeode gewinnan.
Hæfde heo þa gehealdan þæt cynerice þrittig wintra hyre suna Hlodhere to handa.
& heo ða æt him gebohte his dæl ðæs eardes to freodome into ðam mynstre, ða hwile ðe cristendom wære on Englalande gehealden.
& þa gebletsunge heo þærto on Rome begeat, þamðe þa are to Godes þeowdome.
